definition.en: Actor in the subject production [use “character role” (P453) and/or “name of the character role” (P4633) as qualifiers] [use “voice actor” (P725) for voice-only role]. An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.
definition.de: Darsteller einer Haupt- oder Nebenrolle vor der Kamera oder vor Publikum (für reine Sprechrollen verwende „Sprecher“ (P725)). An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.
definition.fr: Acteurs ou intervenants au sein d'une œuvre audiovisuelle ou d'une production d'art scénique. An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.
definition.es: ctores parte del elenco de una obra [usar “rol” (P453) y/o “nombre del rol del personaje” (P4633) como calificadores] [usar “actor de voz” (P725) para actuaciones solo de voz]. An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.
